means: 苏门答腊岛（在印尼西部）

sentence.Network_en: It brought the west coast of Sumatra practically under Dutch supervision.
sentence.Network_cn: 它已使苏门答腊的西海岸实际上置于荷兰人管辖之下.

sentence.Network_en: Early Arad visitors to Sumatra regarded it with dread.
sentence.Network_cn: 早期到过苏门答腊的阿拉伯人都谈虎色变.

sentence.Network_en: The Dutch achieved a great measure of control over the pepper ports of Sumatra.
sentence.Network_cn: 荷兰人对苏门答腊的胡椒港口取得了很大控制权.
